title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text content type does not have any effect on the report.
EB: The report displays the same results regardless of whether the dynamic text element's Content Type property is set to Auto, Plain, or HTML. The expected results are as follows: 1. For Plain, the literal content including tags should be displayed. 2. For Auto, content 1, 2, and 3 should appear properly without any HTML or RTF tags. 3. For HTML, content 1 and 2 should appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 should appear literally with RTF tags. Please refer to the attached report for more details.
